const projectData = [{
  id: "1",
  title: "ABC Learning Website",
  year: "2022",
  category: "Frontend Web Development",
  description: "This was my first web project, where I developed the ABC Learning website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. It includes pages such as Home, Privacy Policy, and Contact Us.",
  image: "/project/abclearningthumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/abclearning.mp4",
  images: ["/project/abclearning1.webp", "/project/abclearning2.webp", "/project/abclearning3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "2",
  title: "MCQ Test Java",
  year: "2022",
  category: "Programming Foundations",
  description: " I developed an MCQ program using Java. The program allows users to input their names, select a test, and answer multiple-choice questions. Answer are stored in a CSV file created using Microsoft Excel. After all questions are answered, the correct answers are displayed above each question, and the program shows the user's name and their test result. This project highlights my ability to create interactive programs and manage data efficiently using Java.",
  image: "/project/mcqjavathumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/mcqjava.mp4",
  images: ["/project/mcqjava1.webp", "/project/mcqjava2.webp", "/project/mcqjava3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "3",
  title: "Design of ABC Website",
  year: "2022",
  category: "UI Framework",
  description: "This project focuses on designing a website by developing wireframes and prototypes using Axure RP 10. Once the prototype is fully functional, usability testing can be conducted to evaluate its performance and user experience.",
  image: "/project/abcxyzuithumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/abcxyzui.mp4",
  images: ["/project/abcxyzui1.webp", "/project/abcxyzui2.webp", "/project/abcxyzui3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "4",
  title: "Database Design of Comunity Portal",
  year: "2022",
  category: "Database Design",
  description: "I developed a database design for a community portal website by creating an Entity Relationship Diagram and a conceptual database model.",
  image: "/project/dbdesigncomportalthumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/dbdesigncomportal.mp4",
  images: ["/project/dbdesigncomportal1.webp", "/project/dbdesigncomportal2.webp", "/project/dbdesigncomportal3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "5",
  title: "ABC Car Deal Website",
  year: "2022",
  category: "Application Implementation and Process",
  description: "I developed a car bidding website with features such as user registration, login, car bidding, posting cars, and searching for cars. The website includes distinct roles for users and admins, ensuring proper access control. It was built using Spring Boot tools",
  image: "/project/abccardealthumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/abccardeal.mp4",
  images: ["/project/abccardeal1.webp", "/project/abccardeal2.webp", "/project/abccardeal3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "6",
  title: "ABC Job Portal Website",
  year: "2022",
  category: "Web Development",
  description: "I developed a Job Portal website with features such as user registration, login, job posting, and job search. The website also includes roles for both admins and users to manage access and functionality effectively.",
  image: "/project/abcjobportalthumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/abcjobportal.mp4",
  images: ["/project/abcjobportal1.webp", "/project/abcjobportal2.webp", "/project/abcjobportal3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "7",
  title: "The Kost Red Palm",
  year: "2023",
  category: "Frontend Web Development | UI Design",
  description: "I created a user interface design and developed a landing page website to support the marketing efforts for Red Palm Kost.",
  image: "/project/redpalmthumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/redpalm.mp4",
  images: ["/project/redpalm1.webp", "/project/redpalm2.webp"]
}, {
  id: "8",
  title: "Jumpa Vendor Website",
  year: "2023",
  category: "Web Development",
  description: "I developed a business website for the Jumpa Vendor team as part of Indonesia's national P2MW program. The platform connects clients with wedding organizer vendors for decoration and makeup services and offers pre-order souvenirs. It also supports digital transactions using Midtrans payment technology.",
  image: "/project/jumpavendorthumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/jumpavendor.mp4",
  images: ["/project/jumpavendor1.webp", "/project/jumpavendor2.webp", "/project/jumpavendor3.webp"]
}, {
  id: "9",
  title: "Wibaloka Website",
  year: "2024",
  category: "Full Stack Web Development",
  description: "I developed a tourism information website focused on Bali, featuring local attractions and culinary highlights. The website also supports transactions for tourism-related products and provides transaction reports that can be filtered by day, month, or year. The payment system integrates Midtrans technology for secure digital transactions.",
  image: "/project/wibalokathumb.webp",
  video: "/project/video/wibaloka.mp4",
  images: ["/project/wibaloka1.webp", "/project/wibaloka2.webp", "/project/wibaloka3.webp", "/project/wibaloka4.webp", "/project/wibaloka5.webp"]
}];
export default projectData;

sourcesContent:
const projectData = [
    {
        id: "1",
        title: "ABC Learning Website",
        year: "2022",
        category: "Frontend Web Development",
        description:
            "This was my first web project, where I developed the ABC Learning website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. It includes pages such as Home, Privacy Policy, and Contact Us.",
        image: "/project/abclearningthumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/abclearning.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/abclearning1.webp",
            "/project/abclearning2.webp",
            "/project/abclearning3.webp",
          ],
    },
    {
        id: "2",
        title: "MCQ Test Java",
        year: "2022",
        category: "Programming Foundations",
        description:
            " I developed an MCQ program using Java. The program allows users to input their names, select a test, and answer multiple-choice questions. Answer are stored in a CSV file created using Microsoft Excel. After all questions are answered, the correct answers are displayed above each question, and the program shows the user's name and their test result. This project highlights my ability to create interactive programs and manage data efficiently using Java.",
        image: "/project/mcqjavathumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/mcqjava.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/mcqjava1.webp",
            "/project/mcqjava2.webp",
            "/project/mcqjava3.webp",
          ],
    },
    {
        id: "3",
        title: "Design of ABC Website",
        year: "2022",
        category: "UI Framework",
        description:
            "This project focuses on designing a website by developing wireframes and prototypes using Axure RP 10. Once the prototype is fully functional, usability testing can be conducted to evaluate its performance and user experience.",
        image: "/project/abcxyzuithumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/abcxyzui.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/abcxyzui1.webp",
            "/project/abcxyzui2.webp",
            "/project/abcxyzui3.webp",
          ],
    },
    {

        category: "Database Design",
        description:
            "I developed a database design for a community portal website by creating an Entity Relationship Diagram and a conceptual database model.",
        image: "/project/dbdesigncomportalthumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/dbdesigncomportal.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/dbdesigncomportal1.webp",
            "/project/dbdesigncomportal2.webp",
            "/project/dbdesigncomportal3.webp",
          ],
    },   
    {
        id: "5",
        title: "ABC Car Deal Website",
        year: "2022",
        category: "Application Implementation and Process",
        description:
            "I developed a car bidding website with features such as user registration, login, car bidding, posting cars, and searching for cars. The website includes distinct roles for users and admins, ensuring proper access control. It was built using Spring Boot tools",
        image: "/project/abccardealthumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/abccardeal.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/abccardeal1.webp",
            "/project/abccardeal2.webp",
            "/project/abccardeal3.webp",
          ],
    },
    {
        id: "6",
        title: "ABC Job Portal Website",
        year: "2022",
        category: "Web Development",
        description:
            "I developed a Job Portal website with features such as user registration, login, job posting, and job search. The website also includes roles for both admins and users to manage access and functionality effectively.",
        image: "/project/abcjobportalthumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/abcjobportal.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/abcjobportal1.webp",
            "/project/abcjobportal2.webp",
            "/project/abcjobportal3.webp",
          ],
    },
    {
        id: "7",
        title: "The Kost Red Palm",
        year: "2023",
        category: "Frontend Web Development | UI Design",
        description:
            "I created a user interface design and developed a landing page website to support the marketing efforts for Red Palm Kost.",
        image: "/project/redpalmthumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/redpalm.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/redpalm1.webp",
            "/project/redpalm2.webp",
          ],
    },
    {
        id: "8",
        title: "Jumpa Vendor Website",
        year: "2023",
        category: "Web Development",
        description:
            "I developed a business website for the Jumpa Vendor team as part of Indonesia's national P2MW program. The platform connects clients with wedding organizer vendors for decoration and makeup services and offers pre-order souvenirs. It also supports digital transactions using Midtrans payment technology.",
        image: "/project/jumpavendorthumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/jumpavendor.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/jumpavendor1.webp",
            "/project/jumpavendor2.webp",
            "/project/jumpavendor3.webp",
          ],
    },
    {
        id: "9",
        title: "Wibaloka Website",
        year: "2024",
        category: "Full Stack Web Development",
        description:
            "I developed a tourism information website focused on Bali, featuring local attractions and culinary highlights. The website also supports transactions for tourism-related products and provides transaction reports that can be filtered by day, month, or year. The payment system integrates Midtrans technology for secure digital transactions.",
        image: "/project/wibalokathumb.webp",
        video: "/project/video/wibaloka.mp4",
        images: [
            "/project/wibaloka1.webp",
            "/project/wibaloka2.webp",
            "/project/wibaloka3.webp",
            "/project/wibaloka4.webp",
            "/project/wibaloka5.webp",
          ],
    },
    
   
  ];
  
  export default projectData;
